name: Avalon Resort
description: Avalon, in a tranquil garden setting, offers self-catering cottages with free Wi-Fi and balconies overlooking the valley and the Puketotora River.

name: Paku Lodge Resort
description: Located on The Esplanade overlooking Tairua Harbor, Paku Lodge Resort offers self-contained accommodations with a private balcony and harbor views.

name: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Wanaka
description: Featuring a heated pool with water slide (seasonal), plus a hot tub and a sauna, this resort is just 2297 feet from the shores of Lake Wanaka.

name: Peppers Bluewater Resort
description: Peppers Bluewater Resort is a 4.5-star hotel close to the shores of Lake Tekapo.

name: Methven Resort
description: Guests can enjoy a relaxing stay at Methven Resort, offering a heated 82 foot outdoor pool in summer and three small heated pools year round. You can dine at the onsite bar and restaurant.

name: Dawsons Hotel
description: Featuring a garden and bar, as well as a restaurant, Dawsons Hotel is located in Reefton. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Both private parking and free WiFi are accessible at the...

name: The Lake Resort - Heritage Collection
description: Heritage Boutique Lake Resort offers villa and studio accommodations in Cromwell, on the edge of Lake Dunstan.

name: Rainforest Retreat
description: Deep In the heart of west coast glacier country, Rainforest Retreat offers a range of accommodations set among lush native bush in the Franz Josef township.

name: The Quarry Restaurant and Bar
description: The Quarry Restaurant and Bar is offering accommodations in Westport. Guests can dine in the restaurant or a drink at the bar and free WiFi is available. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk.

name: The Grosvenor Hotel
description: Located in a restored historic building in the centre of Timaru, The Grosvenor Hotel is just a 2-minute walk from the Intercity bus terminal. It is a 15-minute walk to Caroline Bay Beach.

name: Kingsgate The Avenue Wanganui
description: Kingsgate The Avenue is located on the main road into Wanganui, only a 10-minute walk from the CBD. The spacious studios are decorated in a neutral style and feature satellite TV and private bathrooms. Unlimited free Wi-Fi are provided per day.

name: Barnacle Bills
description: With garden views, Barnacle Bills is located in Kaikoura and has free WiFi.

name: Haast River Motels & Holiday Park
description: Haast River Motels & Holiday Park offers a guest lounge, a shared kitchen and BBQ facilities. All accommodations features a refrigerator and tea/coffee making facilities.

name: The Post Hotel
description: The Post Hotel has accommodations in Porirua. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom, rooms at The Post Hotel also feature free WiFi.

name: Leopard Hotel
description: Located in Waipukurau, Leopard Hotel provides a bar and casino. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and an ATM, along with free WiFi.

name: Endless Summer Lodge
description: Endless Summer Lodge offers beautiful beachfront accommodations in a historic 1870s villa. Guests can relax in the hammocks, or enjoy a walk along 90 Mile Beach.

name: Bealey Hotel
description: Boasting stunning views of mountains, river and the valley, Bealey Hotel is within a 30-minute drive of 5 ski fields. It offers a restaurant, barbecue facilities and free on-site parking.

name: Flat Hills Tourist Park
description: Offering free WiFi and a garden, Flat Hills Tourist Park is located in the beautiful Rangitikei Valley. Free private parking is available on site. All units have a flat-screen TV.

name: Franz Josef Oasis
description: Opened in 2014 and offering 20 luxurious rooms with free WiFi, Franz Josef Oasis is just 10 minutesâ€™ drive from the Franz Josef Glacier.

name: Hotel Hari Hari
description: Offering free WiFi, Hotel Hari Hari is located in Harihari. Among the various facilities of this property are a casino, a garden and a shared lounge. The property features a restaurant.
